title: 'AI investments come under scrutiny amid profitability concerns; sentiment shifting towards generating cash flows'
description: Investor enthusiasm for the artificial intelligence investment theme is witnessing a shift in sentiment, with the market now questioning the massive capital expenditure by tech firms. This heightened scrutiny, with investors expecting companies to demonstrate clear cash flows and returns on AI projects.
content: The frenzied investment in the artificial intelligence (AI) space may be facing a reality check as investors are beginning to question the massive capital expenditure without corresponding cash flows and profits, according to economist William Lee. T... [2229 chars]

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella Calls For AI-driven Shift In Software Development
description: Microsoft Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella on Thursday highlighted the need for a fundamental shift in the way software is built in the age of artificial intelligence, emphasising that the next frontier of innovation will be defined by an AI-driven software development life cycle (SDLC).

title: Ireland’s AI crossroads - regulation and the race for talent
description: Without affordable housing, visas and coherent ICT infrastructure, artificial intelligence researchers will move overseas, say experts
content:
When Andrew Hines talks about Ireland’s artificial intelligence (AI) future, he doesn’t start with algorithms or supercomputers. He starts with housing and the cost of living.
“PhDs can’t afford to live here,” says the assistant professor at Universi... [7358 chars]

title: Bitcoin dips below $90,000 as AI worries dent risk appetite
description: SINGAPORE, Dec 11 (Reuters) - Cryptocurrencies tumbled on Thursday and bitcoin fell back below the $90,000 threshold in a renewed signal of market jitters as fresh concerns about artificial intelligence profits weighed on technology stocks.
content:
SINGAPORE, Dec 11 (Reuters) - Cryptocurrencies tumbled on Thursday and bitcoin fell back below the $90,000 threshold in a renewed signal of market jitters as fresh concerns about artificial intelligence profits weighed on technology stocks.

title: Oracle shares dive as revenue misses forecasts
description: Shares in business computing giant Oracle fell more than 10% on Wednesday on word its revenue missed heady expectations, dampening artificial intelligence euphoria in the market.
content:
Shares in business computing giant Oracle fell more than 10% on Wednesday on word its revenue missed heady expectations, dampening artificial intelligence euphoria in the market.
The slide in after-market trades came despite Texas-based Oracle report... [1461 chars]

title: AI could lead us to extinction within 100 years, warns leading expert in field
description: A leading technology expert has warned that the emergence of artificial intelligence (AI) could drive humanity to extinction.
content:
One AI researcher fears that the technology could result in the end of life as we know it.
Leading AI researcher Roman Yampolskiy has issued a warning to the world, claiming there is a “99.9pc” chance that robots powered by AI could wipe out the enti... [1905 chars]

title: Why Big Tech is doubling down on India with billions in investment
description: Despite being a laggard in some key areas of artificial intelligence, India is becoming a major investment destination for Big Tech companies.
content:
Big Tech is doubling down on investing billions in India, drawn by its abundance of resources for building data centers, a large talent and digital user pool, and market opportunity.
